鏇字的基本解释

鏇
xuàn
见“镟”。

鏇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuàn］
［《廣韻》辝戀切，去線，邪。］
“镟1”的繁体字。
(1)回旋着切削。
(2)今用车床切削或用刀子转着圈地削也称“鏇”。
(3)转轴。
(4)旋子。
(5)以旋温酒。
(6)铜锡盘。
(7)方言。诈取财物。
[②]［xuán］
“镟2”的繁体字。

鏇字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏇； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1319第09
【唐韻】辭戀切，音㳬。【說文】圜鑪也。【廣韻】轉軸裁器。【六書故】溫器也，旋之湯中以溫酒。或曰今之銅錫盤曰鏇，取旋轉爲用也。　又【廣韻】似宣切【集韻】旬宣切，?音旋。轆轤也。

Spin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuàn］
["Guangyun" love cut, go to the line, evil. ]
Traditional characters for "镟1".
(1) Revolving cutting.
(2) Nowadays, cutting with a lathe or turning around with a knife is also called "spin".
(3) Rotating shaft.
(4) Revolute.
(5) The wine is warmed by swirling.
(6) Copper tin plate.
(7) Dialects. Fraudulent property.
[②]［xuán］
Traditional characters for "镟2".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Xuan; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1319 Page 09
【Tang Yun】Cut love, sound 㳬. [Said the text] The furnace is also. [Guangyun] Rotating shaft cutter. [Six Book History] Warm device is also used, and wine is used in the soup of Xuanzhi. Or today's copper tin disk is called spinning, and it is also used for spinning.　[Guang Yun] is like Xuan Qi [Ji Yun] Xuan Xuan Qi,? Yin Xuan. Roller wheel also.
